io.lettuce.core.cluster.topology

Class ClusterTopologyRefresh

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.cluster.topology.ClusterTopologyRefresh

  • public class ClusterTopologyRefresh
extends Object
    Utility to refresh the cluster topology view based on Partitions.
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Detail

      • loadViews

        public Map<RedisURI,Partitions> loadViews(Iterable<RedisURI> seed,
                                          Duration connectTimeout,
                                          boolean discovery)
        Load partition views from a collection of RedisURIs and return the view per RedisURI. Partitions contain an ordered list of RedisClusterNodes. The sort key is latency. Nodes with lower latency come first.
        Parameters:
        seed - collection of RedisURIs
        connectTimeout - connect timeout
        discovery - true to discover additional nodes
        Returns:
        mapping between RedisURI and Partitions

      • getViewedBy

        public RedisURI getViewedBy(Map<RedisURI,Partitions> map,
                            Partitions partitions)
        Resolve a RedisURI from a map of cluster views by Partitions as key
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        partitions - the key
        Returns:
        a RedisURI or null
